name: Kings of Shred Guitar Online Trivia | Bands and Musical Acts | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which of these guitarists links Steve Vai to Frank Zappa?
questions.explanation:
Mike Keneally.

	Multi-talented Mike has been sideman to both Zappa and Vai. Quite a testament to Mike's abilities.

questions.text: What was the name of the guitar duo featuring Marty Friedman and Jason Becker?
questions.explanation:
Cacophony.

	When they came together to unleash their melodic shredding on the world, Friedman and Becker were only teenagers.

questions.text: What nationality is guitarist Brett Garsed?
questions.explanation:
Australian.

	Brett Garsed shreds on an electric guitar without the aid of a plectrum.

questions.text: On which Joe Satriani album would you find the track 'Back to Shalla-Bal'?
questions.explanation:
Flying in a Blue Dream.

	Joe's nickname is 'Satch'.

questions.text: Who is Brett Garsed's recording partner?
questions.explanation:
TJ Helmerich.

	Together they have released a collection of stunning guitar albums.

questions.text: Which of these guitarists HASN'T played in Deep Purple?
questions.explanation:
Yngwie Malmsteen.

	Yngwie and Richie both have very similar guitar set-ups. Fender Stratocaster with scalloped frets, middle pickup disconnected and tone control disconnected. Both players also famously use walls of Marshall amps.

questions.text: Can you name the 3 original members of the G3 lineup?
questions.explanation:
Satriani, Vai, Johnson.

	In a time when many people consider guitar solos 'passe', G3 gigs continue to sell out all across America.

questions.text: Who replaced Paul Gilbert when he quit Mr. Big?
questions.explanation:
Richie Kotzen.

	Paul went back to re-form his original band, Racer X.

questions.text: What name does guitarist Ron Thal often record under?
questions.explanation:
Bumblefoot.

	Ron's music has been used on MTV and Sega's Wild Woody game as well as recordings by Cher and Jessica Simpson.

questions.text: Which guitarist played Jack Butler in the movie 'Crossroads' from 1986?
questions.explanation:
Steve Vai.

	Ry Cooder performed the slide blues guitar in the movie.

questions.text: Which of these guitarists HASN'T been a member of David Lee Roth's band?
questions.explanation:
Randy Rhoads.

	He did, however, play guitar for ANOTHER legendary rock vocalist....Ozzy Osbourne.

questions.text: Eddie Van Halen played the guitar solo on Michael Jackson's 'Beat It', but who played the riff on that song?
questions.explanation:
Steve Lukather.

	Jennifer Batten got the gig as Michael's touring guitarist and had to play that solo live EVERY night on tour.

questions.text: Which of these shredders played guitar on a Robert Palmer album?
questions.explanation:
Nuno Bettencourt.

	However, Dweezil was Lisa Loeb's guitarist on her recent tour.

questions.text: Which of these guitarists did Joe Satriani NOT teach?
questions.explanation:
Zakk Wylde.

	Joe was teaching aged 14!

questions.text: Acoustic Shred!! Al di Meola, John McLaughlin and which other noted acoustic guitarist recorded 'Friday Night In San Francisco'?
questions.explanation:
Paco de Lucia.

	The show was performed on Friday, December 5th, 1985 at the Warfield Theatre, San Francisco California.
